name: Snore
description: While you are asleep, you may activate this move to create a harsh noise that damages all creature within range for 1d8 + MOVE normal damage.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.

contest.effect: Makes the audience quickly grow bored when an appeal move has little effect.
